title: Groper Train: Pervert's Dreams and Reality
overview: A salaried man plays with the crotch of a woman. Eventually, the man in tune reached into his underwear and put his finger in the female organ. At that moment, his finger was cut with a sharp object. The murderous hunter, Wolff, pretending to be the victim, had a metal knife on his right hand resembling a Wolverine claw. Poetry and Rosalie, who witnessed the whole story while doing a beauty station of molesters, were staring at the wolf fangs with envy.
